# outOfDomain

**Type Property**

Numerical argument out of domain.

## Declaration

```swift
static var outOfDomain: Errno { get }
```

## Discussion

A numerical input argument was outside the defined domain of the mathematical function.

The corresponding C error is `EDOM`.

## Math Errors

- **outOfRange**: Numerical result out of range.
- **overflow**: Value too large to be stored in data type.

items.description: Value too large to be stored in data type.
